channel.title: Emulous worth or not worth using?
channel.description: So i want to make a really good server out of it and im thinking is EMULOUS a good base and is worth using or not ?

item.title: Emulous worth or not worth using?
item.dc:creator: @haxifix haxifix
item.description:
@haxifix wrote:

Newty, would you mind sending me that EMULOUS source with all skills, I would like to build off of that, adding Farming and adding some new minigames that I have came up with, or we could work together to make a good source, I don’t know if this is wrong place to ask, but if it is just let me know.

  • haxifix

Read full topic
item.source: Emulous worth or not worth using?

item.title: Emulous worth or not worth using?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

Yes I agree, however, I have gone through my Emulous and fixed alot of shitty code, like useless loops, etc.

I also have programmed every skill into my Emulous, other then Farming of course :D. Each skill is also handled in it’s own file.

Read full topic
item.source: Emulous worth or not worth using?

item.title: Emulous worth or not worth using?
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:8, topic:273822”][quote author=xx qwertyuiop xx link=topic=361849.msg2750967#msg2750967 date=1239909848]
Emulous has a lot of minuses then and very few pluses.
[/quote]

It is much more stable then a run of the mill Deltascape. I think you are saying that content wise it is far behind delta.[/quote]
I know, it’s still better than Deltascape.
It’s still not that much better, however, and the code is very messy and redundant.

Read full topic
